				iqta_law = lenient_taxation
			}
			privilege = {
				peasants_fewer_levies
				peasants_free_peasantry
				peasants_protected_faith
			}

		}
		tolerated_cultures = {
			punjabi
			braji
			haryanvi_culture
			awadhi
			kannauji
			mewati
		}

		#Delhi Setup to accurately portray the starting situation
		currency_data = {
			stability = -40
			prestige = 20
			government_power = 40
			inflation = 1
		}
	}

			#Trailokya-Varman	1203–1245
			#Vira-Varman (Vīravarman)	1245–1285
			#Bhoja-Varman	1285–1288
			#Hammira-Varman (Hammīravarman)	1288–1311

			jaisalmer ludrava pokhran ramgar
		}

		include = "expl_india_hindu"
		include = "india_limited_monarchy"
		government = {
			ruler = jsl_gharsi_singh_bhati
			#One of few independent rulers in this region.
			laws = {
				censorship = limited_censorship
				education_masses_law = basic_religious_education
			}
		}

		tolerated_cultures = {
			sindhi
		}

		capital = jaisalmer
	}

		}

			hausa
			mandara_culture
		}

	}

			ruler_term = {	 character = eth_senfa_ared_iv start_date = 1294.1.1 end_date = 1295.1.1 regnal_number = 4 }
			ruler_term = {	 character = eth_hezba_asgad start_date = 1295.1.1 end_date = 1296.1.1 regnal_number = 1 }
			ruler_term = {	 character = eth_qedma_asgad start_date = 1296.1.1 end_date = 1297.1.1 regnal_number = 1 }
			ruler_term = {	 character = eth_jin_asgad start_date = 1297.1.1 end_date = 1298.1.1 regnal_number = 1 }
			ruler_term = {	 character = eth_saba_asgad start_date = 1298.1.1 end_date = 1299.1.1 regnal_number = 1 }
			ruler_term = {	 character = eth_wedem_arad start_date = 1299.1.1 end_date = 1314.1.1 regnal_number = 1 }
			ruler_term = {	 character = eth_amedee_i_solomon start_date = 1314.1.2 regnal_number = 1 regnal_name = name_gebre_mesqel }


			laws = {
				feudal_de_jure_law = by_tradition
				cultural_traditions_law = martial_society
				education_masses_law = basic_religious_education
				patriarchate_law = separated_patriarchate_policy
				royal_court_customs_law = itinerant_court_policy
			}

			centralization_vs_decentralization = 80
			belligerent_vs_conciliatory = -50
			offensive_vs_defensive = -30
			outward_vs_inward = 0
		}

		country_rank = rank_empire

		liturgical_language = geez_language

		}

				control_of_the_mahdali_coinage_reform
			}

			laws = {
				medieval_levy_law = noble_levies
				censorship = strict_censorship
				administrative_system = local_courts_administration
				marriage_law = muslim_marriage
				heir_religion_law = heir_same_religion
				legal_code_law = sharia_law_policy
				maritime_law = kilwan_merchant_navy
				piracy_law = anti_piracy_policy
				distribution_of_power_law = dop_favor_the_burghers
				education_masses_law = basic_religious_education
				feudal_de_jure_law = by_blood
				royal_court_customs_law = court_of_culture_policy
				cultural_traditions_law = martial_society
				iqta_law = efficient_tax_farming
				sharia_law = shafii_policy
			}

			aristocracy_vs_plutocracy = 80
			centralization_vs_decentralization = 75
			traditionalist_vs_innovative = 15
			spiritualist_vs_humanist = 0
			serfdom_vs_free_subjects = 30
			mercantilism_vs_free_trade = 95
			belligerent_vs_conciliatory = -50
			quality_vs_quantity = 0
			offensive_vs_defensive = -20
			land_vs_naval = 25
			capital_economy_vs_traditional_economy = -75
			individualism_vs_communalism = -50
			outward_vs_inward = -80

			privilege = {
				#Nobles
				elaborate_court_ceremonies
				noble_sponsored_navy

				#Clergy
				clergy_literacy_rights
				clergy_enforced_unity
				embellish_great_works_of_faith

				#Burghers
				formal_guilds
				building_rights
				commercial_advisory_council
				land_of_commerce
				market_fairs
				shipwright_contracts
				sponsor_maritime_contracts

				#Peasants
				partial_yield
				peasants_free_peasantry

				#Dhimmi
				dhimmi_land_rights
				dhimmi_administrative_posts

				#Tribes
				tribes_land_rights
				tribes_pasture_access
			}

			ruler_term = { character = zan_al_hassan_ibn_talut_mahdali start_date = 1277.1.1 end_date = 1294.1.1 regnal_number = 1 }
			ruler_term = { character = zan_suleiman_ibn_hassan_mahdali start_date = 1294.1.1 end_date = 1308.1.1 regnal_number = 1 }
			ruler_term = { character = zan_daud_ibn_suleiman_mahdali start_date = 1308.1.1 end_date = 1310.1.1 regnal_number = 1 }
			ruler_term = { character = zan_abu_al_mawahib_al_hasan_ibn_suleiman start_date = 1310.1.1 end_date = 1333.1.1 regnal_number = 1 }
			ruler_term = { character = zan_daud_mahdali start_date = 1333.1.1 regnal_number = 2 }
		}
		religious_school = shafii_school
		government = { mysticism_vs_jurisprudence = 20 }
		

		tolerated_cultures = {
			yao_culture
			swahili_culture
		}

		currency_data = {
			stability = 40 #Smooth and voluntary transition of power from previous Sultan
			prestige = 25
			government_power = 90 #Smooth and voluntary transition of power from previous Sultan
		}

		capital = kilwa_kisiwani
		court_language = persian_language
	}

			bozok baliseyh candir dinek_keskin sorgun
			corum huseyinabad sungurlu
			divrigi arapgir egin arguvan
			kayseri bogazliyan comana_cil develi tomarza
			hacibektas urgup
			sivas darende dasmenda deliktash gemerek gurun hafik sarkisla zara
			bayburt erzincan ilic kelkit kemah sebinkarahisar siran
			yahyali malatya
			}

		our_cores_conquered_by_others = {
			amasya
		}

		starting_technology_level = 3
		include = "expl_eastern_europe"
		include = "expl_muslim_mediterranean"
		include = "turkish_beylik_no_coast_no_greek"
		government = {
			ruler_term = {	 character = ere_eretna start_date = 1335.1.1 }
			ruler = ere_eretna
			privilege = {
				dhimmi_abrahamic_communities

				trunk_road_to_erzurum_privilege
			}
		}

		country_rank = rank_duchy

		capital = sivas
		religious_school = maturidi_school #Widespread among the Turks together with Hanafi
		tolerated_cultures = {
			armenian_culture
			turkoman_culture
		}
	}

	#Ottomans - TUR https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rise_of_the_Ottoman_Empire
	TUR = {
		own_control_core = {
			beypazari kibrus kizilca
			bolu akcasehir akyazi konrapa gerede mengen mudurnu
			bursa adranos iznik
			izmit atpazari
			domanic
			sultanonu bilecik goynuk eynegol inonu nalli sogut
		}

		include = "expl_eastern_europe"
		include = "expl_muslim_mediterranean"
		include = "turkish_beylik"
		government = {

			ruler_term = {	 character = tur_osman start_date = 1299.1.1 end_date = 1324.1.1 regnal_number = 1	}
			ruler_term = {	 character = tur_orhan start_date = 1324.1.1 regnal_number = 1	}

			ruler = tur_orhan

			centralization_vs_decentralization = 10
			aristocracy_vs_plutocracy = -30
			serfdom_vs_free_subjects = 0
			traditionalist_vs_innovative = 10
			spiritualist_vs_humanist = 10
			mercantilism_vs_free_trade = -25
			offensive_vs_defensive = 0
			land_vs_naval = -20
			quality_vs_quantity = -30
			belligerent_vs_conciliatory = -40
			capital_economy_vs_traditional_economy = 80
			individualism_vs_communalism = -20
			outward_vs_inward = -60

			privilege = {
				#Nobles
				elaborate_court_ceremonies
				noble_sponsored_navy
				ghazi_privilege

				#Clergy
				clergy_literacy_rights
				clergy_enforced_unity
				embellish_great_works_of_faith
				clergy_literacy_rights
				clergy_land_rights

				#Burghers
				formal_guilds
				building_rights
				market_fairs
				shipwright_contracts
				sponsor_maritime_contracts

				#Peasants
				partial_yield
				peasants_free_peasantry

				#Dhimmi
				dhimmi_land_rights
				dhimmi_administrative_posts
				dhimmi_abrahamic_communities
				dhimmi_pact_of_umar

				#Tribes
				tribes_land_rights
				tribes_pasture_access
			}

			laws = {
				royal_court_customs_law = harem_policy
			}
		}

		tolerated_cultures = {
			greek_culture
			turkoman_culture
		}

		capital = bursa

		country_rank = rank_duchy

		religious_school = maturidi_school #since their founding they were supporters of maturidi, although they were also among the earliest adopters of hanafi and had ismaili, alawi, alevi, bektashi and mevlevi
	}

			otzoya tzunun_kaab huehuetan
		}
		include = "amerindian_advanced_monarchy_not_nahuatl"
		include = "expl_mesoamerica"
		government = {
			type = monarchy
			heir_selection = cognatic_primogeniture
			ruler = kic_kokaib
		}
		court_language = maya_language
		capital = pismachi
	}

	#-------------------------- Tibet and Xinjiang ----------------------------
	TIB = { #Tibet
		own_control_core = {
			sakya ganden_delingshar lhadrak ngamring tagmo_lingkha
			shigatse jonang namling tropu tsangdram
			lhasa damzhung drigung galo gyama taklung tsora tsurphu
			nedong densatil gongkar nyemo rinpung_yarlung samye
			dingri chorten_nyima gonga_chode nyalam pelmo
			gyantse nenying ralung
			trigu chikchar gonpatsi lhodrak lho_taklung tragor zangchen
			gyamda buchu daklha_gampo zhokha
			nakchu barom rongpo
			namtso_doring tsedzong ronglung gonkri
			serzhik shantsa zangdan
			mendong samten selephu
			phari
			tsherlung ormogang
		}

		our_cores_conquered_by_others = {
			toling dungkar tsaparang
			gartok rala
			gyanema khyunglung
			purang tokchen
			shey leh charasa kargil karpokhar lamayuru
			skardu khaplu shigar
			nako tabo tsorub
			rutok drangtse hanle tashigang
			zangla padum phuktal
			dzongkar baryang dargyeling lo_mustang tradun
			pome lhari chumdo shukden
			rigyal metog tirkong
			rima sangacho walong
			ganze manigango trotsang
			longtang gegong mangge sershul
			dzagyal khana lab serkar
			derge jomda katok kharak sibda tromge wara_kham
			nangchen chodrak gechak jang_tana pelme zurmang_namgyaltse
			jyekundo lungsho
			gonjo drayab sho tangkya
			chamdo karma_densa khamgar
			lhakhang pasho pema
			batang markham shar_yelpuk
			tsakhalkho dzogang mengung
			sampheling dzingcho sangme
			biru pembar riwoche samda shopando sok tengchen yangdzong
			litang nyachukha
			nyarong chodrak_kham dawu dzogon khordong
			zhanggu durgyeling geshitsa rahor yungdrung
			dartang droge metsang takden
			darlag amnye_machen bayan_har lungkya madoi
			serta dzamtang nubzur shukjung
			dartsedo lhagang baurang
			chabcha buha caka dulan dungkar_amdo guolimu qardam
		}

		country_rank = rank_kingdom

		starting_technology_level = 3
		include = "expl_china"

		government = {
			type = theocracy
			heir_selection = theocratic_elective
			ruler = tib_namkha_lekpa

			aristocracy_vs_plutocracy = -60
			centralization_vs_decentralization = -60
			traditionalist_vs_innovative = -50
			spiritualist_vs_humanist = -25
			serfdom_vs_free_subjects = -40
			mercantilism_vs_free_trade = -80
			belligerent_vs_conciliatory = -50
			quality_vs_quantity = 20
			offensive_vs_defensive = 10
			land_vs_naval = -20
			capital_economy_vs_traditional_economy = 80
			individualism_vs_communalism = 20
			outward_vs_inward = -95

			parliament = {
				parliament_type = council
			}

			laws = {
				censorship = limited_censorship
				education_masses_law = basic_religious_education
				administrative_system = feudal_administration
				cultural_traditions_law = civil_society
				marriage_law = monogamous_marriage
				heir_religion_law = heir_special_succession
				legal_code_law = traditional_law_policy
				distribution_of_power_law = dop_traditional_distribution_of_power
			}
			privilege = {
				#Clergy
				clergy_literacy_rights
				clergy_land_rights
				embellish_great_works_of_faith
				promote_cultural_unity
				#Nobles
				nobles_land_rights
				noble_serfdom_rights
				noble_fortification_licenses
				elaborate_court_ceremonies
			}
		}

		tolerated_cultures = {
			changpa_culture
			khampa_culture
		}

		capital = sakya
	}

	#-------------------------- Indonesia ----------------------------

	MAJ = { #Majapahit
		own_control_core = {
			trowulan bajrajinaparamitapura balambangan lumajang malang pakembangan sadeng
			surabaya bangkalan bawean gresik kangean sugeneb tuban_java
			pajang daha jagaraga matahun tulungagung wengker
			mataram bagaluhan borobudur dieng pacitan purwalingga
			demak jepara pandansalas pati pekalongan semarang
		}
		include = "expl_indonesian_trade_route"
		include = "expl_indonesia"
		include = "indonesia_monarchy"
		starting_technology_level = 3
		government = {
			ruler_term = { character = maj_raden_wijaya start_date = 1293.1.1 end_date = 1309.1.1 regnal_number = 1 }
			ruler_term = { character = maj_jayanagara start_date = 1309.1.1 end_date = 1328.1.1 regnal_number = 1 }
			ruler_term = { character = maj_tribhuwana start_date = 1328.1.1 regnal_number = 1 }

			ruler = maj_tribhuwana

			laws = {
				medieval_levy_law = noble_levies
				censorship = strict_censorship
				administrative_system = maj_office_of_the_mahapatih
				marriage_law = polygyny
				heir_religion_law = heir_same_religion
				legal_code_law = traditional_law_policy
				maritime_law = protect_trade_routes
				piracy_law = anti_piracy_policy
				distribution_of_power_law = dop_favor_the_ruler
				education_masses_law = basic_religious_education
				feudal_de_jure_law = by_tradition
				royal_court_customs_law = court_of_culture_policy
				cultural_traditions_law = martial_society
			}

			aristocracy_vs_plutocracy = -15
			centralization_vs_decentralization = 33
			traditionalist_vs_innovative = -20
			spiritualist_vs_humanist = -40
			serfdom_vs_free_subjects = 25
			mercantilism_vs_free_trade = 25
			belligerent_vs_conciliatory = -50
			quality_vs_quantity = 0
			offensive_vs_defensive = -10
			land_vs_naval = 50
			capital_economy_vs_traditional_economy = -5
			individualism_vs_communalism = 10
			outward_vs_inward = -50
		}

		accepted_cultures = {
			madurese_culture
		}

		capital = trowulan
		country_rank = rank_kingdom
	}

			}
		}

			surigaonon_culture
		}

		capital = butuan
	}

		}

	#Mohawk/Kanien'kehaka

		}

		starting_technology_level = 0
		include = "haudenosaunee_tribe"
		include = "expl_amerindian_east_coast"
		government = {
			ruler = random

	#Oneida/Onyotaaka
	ONY = {

		own_control_core = {
			onenioteke oneniote teiehonwahkhkwatha niiohehsane oswegatchie nikahionhwakowa
		}

		starting_technology_level = 0
		include = "haudenosaunee_tribe"
		include = "expl_amerindian_east_coast"
		government = {
			ruler = random
		}
		capital = onenioteke

		currency_data = {
			gold = 100
			stability = 33
			tribal_cohesion = 90
		}
	}

	#Pamlico
	PML = {
		type = pop

		add_pops_from_locations = {
		pamlico neuse coree corani chicora
		}

		discovered_regions = {
			canada_region
			east_coast_region
			great_plains_region
		}

		include = "amerindian_tribe"
		include = "expl_mesoamerica"
	 	government = {
			type = tribe
			heir_selection = tribal_oldest_male
			ruler = random
		}
	}

		}

	include = "expl_middle_east"

		starting_technology_level = 0
		include = "muslim_tribe_no_coast"
		government = {
			type = tribe
			heir_selection = tribal_oldest_male
			ruler = random

			laws = {
				sharia_law = hanbali_policy
			}
		}

		religious_school = hanbali_school
		government = { mysticism_vs_jurisprudence = 40 }
		

		capital = madin_bani_sulaym

	}

	#Cahokia Mississippian Site
	#https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cahokia
	CHK = {
		own_control_core = {
			cahokia peewareewa sangamon amonokoa macoupin tamaroa wyaconda oahaha emasulia
			chariton meramec pahatsi tanwakanwakaghe moingwena
			kaskaskia kaskankaham chepoussa ochechiton st_francois_mts
			nudarcha wimihsoorita nodaway
			peoria
		}
		starting_technology_level = 1

		government = {
			ruler = random

			type = tribe
			heir_selection = tribal_oldest_male

			centralization_vs_decentralization = 80
			traditionalist_vs_innovative = -70
			spiritualist_vs_humanist = -60
			aristocracy_vs_plutocracy = -80
			serfdom_vs_free_subjects = 50
			mercantilism_vs_free_trade = 50
			belligerent_vs_conciliatory = 100
			quality_vs_quantity = -75
			offensive_vs_defensive = 50
			land_vs_naval = -90
			capital_economy_vs_traditional_economy = 100
			individualism_vs_communalism = 60
			outward_vs_inward = 50	

			parliament = {
				parliament_type = assembly
			}	

			laws = {
				marriage_law = polygyny
				heir_religion_law = heir_same_religion
			}

			reforms = {
				agricultural_cultivation
			}
			privilege = {
				#nobles
				nobility_council
				nobles_land_rights
				tribal_autonomy

				#clergy
				embellish_great_works_of_faith

				#burghers
				urban_development_grants
				market_fairs

				#Commoners
				peasants_autonomous_villages
				communal_lands
				allow_hunting
				partial_yield
				peasants_free_peasantry
		
				tribes_tribal_levies
				tribes_allow_gatherings
			}
		}

		discovered_areas = {
			#east_coast_region
			illinois_area
			wisconsin_area
			indiana_area
			kentucky_area
			tennessee_area
			#louisiana_region
			missouri_area
			iowa_area
			arkansas_area
			central_plains_area
		}		

		tolerated_cultures = {
			tsawi_culture
			ponca_culture
			kaskankaham_culture
			kahokiaki_culture
		}

		currency_data = {
			gold = 180
			stability = 20
			prestige = 5
			tribal_cohesion = 80
		}

		court_language = dhegiha_language
		capital = cahokia
	}

		include = "polynesian_tribe"

			ruler = random
		}
